DOC.brief_summary: Masimo Sedline brain function monitors are sensors (stickers) placed on a the forehead to monitor levels of "sedation" based on a bilateral 4-channel electroencephalogram (EEG). The purpose of this study is to observe the effectiveness of the Sedline monitor to detect the unilateral hemispheric EEG changes seen in Wada testing
DOC.brief_title: Sedline 4 Channel Electroencephalogram (EEG) Monitoring During Suppression of Unilateral Hemispheric Function (Wada Test
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older scheduled for Wada testing at MUSC No exclusions
